group_1.narration: Hint...@It's the best place for "training" 「鍛」@one's "strength" 「力」.

group_1.textRight: A-are we sure this is the right gym?
Let's go inside!
The "former" 「元」 and "body" 「身」 kanji...

group_1.textLeft: What was the actual hint for this gym?

group_1.narration: Hint...@The place where the "former" 「元」 Japanese team@visited to train their "body" 「身」.

group_1.textRight: I see...
I'm pretty sure there's another gym near here!

group_1.narration: < Sakae Ward in a Different Gym >

group_1.textRight: This has to be the place with the@"strength" 「力」 kanji!

group_1.narration: Hint...@If you want to work out with all your might,@we won't let you "down" 「下」!@It's "clear" 「明」 that you came to the best place!

group_1.textRight: Wrong...again...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, we can make a word using the kanji we@found at both gyms.

group_1.textRight: U-uhm...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@Not a good word after all, huh?
How many times did we go to the wrong place...

group_1.textRight: I don't think we are the only team making@this kind of mistake.
Solving the hints seems to be the hardest@part of the event.

group_1.textLeft: If the answer isn't a sports gym...then what is it?

group_1.textRight: ...There's also other types of gyms,@like boxing gyms.

group_1.textLeft: Should we go to the place Ria told us about?

group_1.textRight: Yes...let's go.
The "throw" 「投」 kanji should be here.

group_1.narration: Hint...@If you're looking for@「脱」「毛」 "hair removal" services,@you came to the right place!

group_1.textRight: We got it wrong again...@So it wasn't Esther.

group_1.textLeft: Is there another place where we can buy diet@supplements?

group_1.textRight: Maybe the answer isn't diet supplements,@but cosmetic surgery...?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't think finding kanji would be@this difficult.

group_1.textRight: ...We don't have any more trails to follow.

group_1.textLeft: I'm surprised how serious this event is.

group_1.textRight: Things might get tough if we don't settle@on a kanji soon...

group_1.textLeft: We have a lot of cards.

group_1.textRight: It might be hard, with all the random kanji@we found...
Right.
Uhm...

group_1.narration: "Member" 「員」, "all" 「全」, "field" 「野」,@"ball" 「球」, "child" 「子」, "complete" 「熟」,@"sphere" 「玉」, "half" 「半」, "former" 「元」,@"body" 「身」, "down" 「下」, "clear" 「明」,@"removal" 「脱」, and "hair" 「毛」.

group_1.textRight: ...Oh.@..."Body hair removal"「全身脱毛」.

group_1.textCenter: (We don't even know what to do anymore.)
